cab.content: From Viceroy, Army Department, 19th June 1917.(Received 20th, 10 a.m.)8999. Mahsud operations. xAdvanced brigade reached Haidari Kach on15th without opposition beyond few shots. Force from Sarwakai co-operated.On 16th Force was engaged in improving road through Shahur Tangi andin punitive measures in Shahur Valley. No opposition met with. Mahsudsreported as attempting to raise fresh lashkars to oppose Force in place oforiginal Iashkar, which, is said to have been dispersed on account of heatand lack of rations.
